text: The Ezzedine Al-Qassam Brigades (), usually shortened to Al-Qassam Brigades, is the military wing of the Palestinian party Hamas. They operate in the Gaza Strip and are responsible for various military activities, including rocket attacks against Israel. The group was founded in the late 1980s and is named after Izz ad-Din al-Qassam, a Syrian preacher and nationalist leader who played a role in the Arab anti-colonial struggle in the early 20th century. The Brigades have been involved in conflicts with Israel. Al-Qassam spokesperson, Abu Obaida stated in a public speech in 2023 during the Israeli war on Gaza that 85% of their recruits are orphans who wish for revenge whose parents were killed by the Israeli Forces. == Related pages == * First Intifada * Al-Quds Brigades * Popular Front for the Liberation of Palestine * Democratic Front for the Liberation of Palestine == Notes == ==References== Category:Palestine Category:Gaza Strip Category:Arabâ€“Israeli conflict Category:National liberation movements Category:Hamas Category:Nationalist organizations in Palestine Category:Islamist militant groups Category:Military wings of political parties Category:Palestinian resistance factions
title: Ezzedeen Al-Qassam Brigades
